issue.title: [CF 37] 20+ lua errors/sec with beta3
issue.body:
What version of the product are you using?
2.0.0 beta3

Do you have an error log of what happened?
1x TellMeWhen-2.0.0\TellMeWhen.lua:1697: attempt to compare number with string
(tail call): ?:
TellMeWhen-2.0.0\TellMeWhen.lua:1617: in function `TellMeWhen_Icon_ConditionCheck'
TellMeWhen-2.0.0\TellMeWhen.lua:1183: in function <TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1178>

Locals:
(*temporary) = 0.13900001347065
(*temporary) = <function> defined =[C]:-1

Please provide any additional information below.
Only getting errors on my hunter, works totally fine on other characters that also have some condition checks.
My custom icons are the following:

> Posted by CurseForge user Entitulus | Imported from CurseForge issue #37 | Raw

comments.body:
I love you for including the settings. If you dont want to wait for next version, go to the settings for these icons and change all

["ConditionLevel"] = "20",

to

["ConditionLevel"] = 20,

(just remove the quotes from all the the ["ConditionLevel"] numbers)

Or if you would rather wait for the fix to upload, or if it is already up when you read this, just install it and type

/run TellMeWhen_ConvertConditionsToNumbers()


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Also, might I suggest setting kill shot as a reactive icon instead of a cooldown icon, that way you dont need conditions for the health of the target.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks a lot, removing quotes from ConditionLevel values fixed it. Also good idea to change Kill Shot to reactive icon, originally made it by mimicing my shadow priests Shadow Word: Death "execute" icon that works bit differently.

Keep up the good work.


> Posted by CurseForge user Entitulus
